story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_03:
We found him sleeping right in the middle of the
road, so we brought him back with us...
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_05:
Snoring so loud... He’s enjoying his little nap,
isn’t he.
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_07:
Hey! This grunt doesn’t seem to be having
any nightmares!
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_09:
Sheesh. I can’t believe he’s sleeping on the job.
Wake up, you!
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_10:
Urgh. Morning already? I’d like a cup of
Tapu Cocoa, please...
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_11: H-how dare you show such laziness!
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_12:
Where is your pride as a member of
Team Galactic?
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_16:
In the flesh! I was wearing a Team Galactic
disguise, but that was just a means to snoop
around!
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_17:
My code name, it is Looker! I’m a middle-aged
looker, so to speak, working for the
International Police!
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_18: Why were you dressed like Team Galactic?
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_20:
All these members of Team Galactic are operating
without a boss to keep them in line, so I was
gathering all sorts of information from them!
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_21:
And, by piecing together all those vague bits of
information, I’ve figured out where he is!
story_teamgalactic_02_08000/2401_1201_22: What?! Tell us what you know, immediately!
